name: The Rabbit and The Owl
description: The Rabbit and The Owl is a cooperative puzzle-platformer where you (or you and a friend) journey through a fractured yet beautiful and hand-painted negative space landscape. The titular characters are confined to the realms of light and dark and are only able to progress through constant cooperation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 10 or higher Processor: 2.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics from 2012 (e.g. Intel HD 4000) or later Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Only Xbox 360/One controllers have been officially tested. If you have other controllers (e.g. PS4, Steam Controller, etc.), you may have to use an external wrapper to map them the Xbox control scheme.
